timeline.message: changed startup process: fs watchers declared deprecated because unreliable
changed startup listener to react on app ready event (was running too early)
[#4] volumes and nodes as items, preliminary icons
fix for overlapping items in hex maps
SEED and DEMO mode can run together
fix for AllGroupsGraph: when items had no group, not virtual group connections were created
slightly more svg padding in order not to cut connections drawn close to borders
slighty improved group container radius calculation
added data to svg relations, prevent inverse relation painting

timeline.bodyText: Should be renamed to isReference or something similar because process is already a method in our class
